weekly_top_story.headline: Senate rejects dueling bills to address expiring Obamacare tax credits
weekly_top_story.summary: The Senate voted against two competing plans to extend enhanced Affordable Care Act premium tax credits set to expire, potentially leaving over 20 million Americans facing higher health insurance costs and disrupting coverage stability.

stories.headline: CMS Innovation Center releases new lifestyle medicine model
stories.summary: CMS launched the voluntary MAHA ELEVATE Model to test whole-person lifestyle medicine approaches for chronic disease management through cooperative agreements, aiming to build evidence for value-based care innovations.

stories.headline: FDA releases request for information on testosterone replacement therapy for men
stories.summary: The FDA issued an RFI seeking stakeholder input on indications, dosing, administration, and treatment goals for testosterone replacement therapy, with comments due February 9, 2026, to potentially refine regulatory guidance.
